summary: One-page business website for WordPress Capital showcasing services (WordPress, WooCommerce, Shopify, React/Vue, hosting).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal modern logo mark with the text "WordPress Capital" (wp-capital-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Abstract web development hero illustration (laptop/browser/code/e-commerce motif) (wp-capital-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive one-page marketing website for the business name "WordPress Capital" with clear sectioning and smooth in-page navigation.

Add a Services section that lists and groups the provided offerings exactly: WordPress Development (including Theme creation/customisation and Plugin development), WooCommerce Development, Shopify Development, ReactJS / Vue JS, and Hosting solutions.
Include a Hero section featuring the business name "WordPress Capital" and a concise tagline describing web development and e-commerce solutions (in English).
Apply a creative, coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) consistently across the one-page site.
Add the generated image assets to the frontend as static files under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and render them in the page (logo and hero visual).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a one-page website for the business "WordPress Capital" listing services (WordPress theme customization, plugin development, WooCommerce, Shopify, React/Vue, hosting solutions).
